TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Installer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供自定义安装的基础。

span.span: Provides the foundation for custom installations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 .NET Framework 中所有自定义安装程序的基类。This is the base class for all custom installers in the .NET Framework. 安装程序是帮助在计算机上安装应用程序的组件。Installers are components that help install applications on a computer. 若要使用, 必须执行以下几个步骤:There are several steps you must follow to use an : - 继承类。Inherit the class. - 重写 、、和方法。 Override the , , , and methods. - 将添加`true`到派生类中, 并将其设置为。 Add the to your derived class and set it to `true`. - 将派生类放置在应用程序的程序集中, 以便进行安装。Put your derived class in the assembly with your application to install. - 调用安装程序。Invoke the installers. 例如, 使用 Installutil.exe 调用安装程序。For example, use the InstallUtil.exe to invoke the installers. 属性包含安装程序的集合。The property contains a collection of installers. 如果此实例为安装程序集合的一部分, 则 属性设置为包含集合的实例。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 有关使用集合的示例, 请参阅类。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. 类的、 、和方法通过存储在属性中的安装程序的集合, 并调用每个安装程序的相应方法。 The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers stored in the property, and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. 不总是对同一实例调用、 、和方法。The , , , and methods are not always called on the same instance. 例如, 可以在安装和提交应用程序时使用一个实例, 然后释放对该实例的引用。For example, one instance might be used while installing and committing an application, and then the reference to that instance is released. 稍后, 卸载应用程序会创建对新实例的引用, 这意味着该方法由不同的实例调用。Later, uninstalling the application creates a reference to a new instance, meaning that the method is called by a different instance of . 出于此原因, 在派生类中, 不要将计算机的状态保存在安装程序中。For this reason, in your derived class, do not save the state of a computer in an installer. 相反, 请使用跨调用保留并传入、 、 和方法的。Instead, use an that is preserved across calls and passed into your , , , and methods. 两种情况阐释了在状态保护中保存信息的需要。Two situations illustrate the need to save information in the state-saver . 首先, 假设安装程序设置了注册表项。First, suppose that your installer sets a registry key. 它应在中保存密钥的原始值。It should save the key's original value in the . 如果回滚安装, 则可以还原原始值。If the installation is rolled back, the original value can be restored. 其次, 假设安装程序替换了现有文件。Second, suppose the installer replaces an existing file. 将现有文件保存在临时目录中, 并将该文件的新位置的位置保存在中。Save the existing file in a temporary directory and the location of the new location of the file in the . 如果安装已回滚, 则会删除较新的文件, 并将其替换为原位置。If the installation is rolled back, the newer file is deleted and replaced by the original from the temporary location. 属性包含有关安装的信息。The property contains information about the installation. 例如, 有关安装的日志文件的位置、要保存方法所需信息的文件的位置, 以及运行安装可执行文件时输入的命令行。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. 它创建一个继承自的类。It creates a class which inherits from . 当完成时, 将发生事件并显示一条消息。When is about to complete, event occurs and a message is displayed. 若要使用类, 必须在项目中引用**system.web**程序集。To use the class, you must reference the **System.Configuration.Install** assembly in your project. [!code-cpp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CPP/installer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/CS/installer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer/VB/installer.vb#1)]

span.span: Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)

exception.span: 在安装的 阶段发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 忽略该异常，安装继续进行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the installation continues.

exception.span: 但是在安装完成后，应用程序可能无法正常工作。

span.span: However, the application might not function correctly after the installation is complete.

para.span: 如果在派生类中重写方法, 请确保先在派生方法中调用基类的方法。

span.span: If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.

para.span: 仅当此实例中的每个安装程序的 方法成功时,才会调用方法。

span.span: The method is called only if the method of each installer in this instance's succeeds.

para.span: 方法存储执行正确卸载所需的信息, 并调用集合中每个安装程序的方法。

span.span: The method stores information needed to do a correct uninstallation, and calls the method of each installer in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::InstallContext ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置关于当前安装的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the current installation.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含关于当前安装的信息。

span.span: An that contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含安装信息。The property contains installation information. 例如, 有关安装的日志文件的位置、要保存方法所需信息的文件的位置, 以及运行安装可执行文件时输入的命令行。For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 调用 、、或方法的程序设置属性, 其中包含方法所需的信息。 The program that calls the , , , or methods sets the property with information that the methods need. 如果安装程序属于安装程序集合, 则父安装程序将在调用这些方法中的任何方法之前设置属性。If an installer belongs to an installer collection, the parent installer sets the property before calling any of these methods. 父安装程序可通过属性进行访问。The parent installer can be accessed through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类的属性。The following example demonstrates the property of the class. 属性的内容包含有关安装的日志文件的位置、文件的保存位置以及该方法所需的信息的位置的信息, 以及在安装时输入的命令行。可执行文件已运行。The contents of the property contain information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run. 然后在控制台上显示这些内容。These contents are then displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CPP/installer_context.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/CS/installer_context.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Context#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Context/VB/installer_context.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文字。

span.span: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.

value.span: 安装程序集合中所有安装程序的帮助文本，包括安装程序的用途说明以及可执行安装文件（如 InstallUtil.exe 实用工具）的命令行选项，这些选项可以传递给该安装程序并为其所识别。

span.span: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what the installer does and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the InstallUtil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by this installer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示了属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此属性是在类中定义的, 在调用时, 它返回可执行文件的说明和可执行文件的命令行选项 (如 installutil.exe 实用工具), 可以将其传递到.This property is defined in the class, which, when called, returns the description of the and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the Installutil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by the . [!code-cpp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CPP/installer_helptext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/CS/installer_helptext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_HelpText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_HelpText/VB/installer_helptext.vb#1)]

exception.span: 安装程序集合中的安装程序之一指定了一个 null 引用，而不是帮助文本。

span.span: One of the installers in the installer collection specifies a null reference instead of help text.

exception.span: 此异常的一个可能原因是定义了要包含帮助文本的字段，但未对其进行初始化。

span.span: A likely cause for this exception is that a field to contain the help text is defined but not initialized.

exception.span: 该集合的一个安装程序的 事件处理程序发生异常。

para.span: -如果在派生类中重写方法, 请确保先在派生方法中调用基类的方法。

span.span: - If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.

para.span: 方法调用此实例的属性中包含的每个安装程序的方法。

span.span: The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance.

para.span: 在包含的安装程序运行后, 此方法更新对象 ( 通过参数指定) 以反映安装的状态。

span.span: After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.

para.span: 传递给方法时, 应为空。

span.span: The should be empty when passed to the method.

para.span: 如果所有方法均成功 , 则调用方法。

span.span: If all the methods succeed, the method is called.

para.span: 否则, 将调用方法。

span.span: Otherwise, the method is called.

para.span: -如果需要将安装程序实例添加到 方法中的集合, 请确保在方法中对集合执行相同的添加。

span.span: - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method.

para.span: 但是, 如果将安装程序实例添加到自定义安装程序的类构造函数中的集合, 则可以避免在这两种方法中维护该集合。

span.span: However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.

summary.span: 获取或设置包含该安装程序所属的集合的安装程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the installer containing the collection that this installer belongs to.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含此实例所属的集合；或者，如果此实例不属于集合，则为 。

span.span: An containing the collection that this instance belongs to, or if this instance does not belong to a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此实例为安装程序集合的一部分, 则 属性设置为包含集合的实例。If this instance of is part of an installer collection, the property is set to the instance that contains the collection. 有关使用集合的示例, 请参阅类。For an example of the use of the collection, see the class. 属性包含安装程序的集合。The property contains a collection of installers. 类的、、和方法将遍历安装程序的集合, 并调用每个安装程序的相应方法。 The , , , and methods of the class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 属性获取包含此所属的集合的。 The property gets the containing the collection that this belongs to. param.name: savedState

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，还原计算机的安装前状态。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, restores the pre-installation state of the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示的方法。The following example demonstrates the method of . 方法在的派生类中被重写。 The method is overridden in the derived class of . 系统会生成一个例外, 强制执行回滚。An exception is generated to force an installation rollback. [!code-cpp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CPP/installer_rollback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/CS/installer_rollback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Rollback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Rollback/VB/installer_rollback.vb#1)]

exception.span: 参数为 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 保存的状态 可能已损坏。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 在安装的 阶段发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred during the phase of the installation.

exception.span: 忽略该异常，回滚继续进行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the rollback continues.

exception.span: 但是，回滚完成后计算机可能无法完全还原为其初始状态。

span.span: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.

para.span: 在派生类中重写方法时, 请确保先在派生方法中调用基类的方法。

span.span: When you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.

para.span: 回滚操作将计算机还原到安装前的状态。

span.span: A rollback operation restores the computer to the state it was in before the installations occurred.

para.span: 如果此实例的 方法或安装程序集合中的任何安装程序无法正常运行, 则调用方法。

span.span: The method is called if the method of this instance of , or any installer in the installer collection, fail to run correctly.

para.span: 通过调用安装程序集合中的安装程序方法生成的任何异常都将被忽略, 并且其他安装程序的回滚将继续。

span.span: Any exceptions generated by calling the methods of the installers in the installer collection are ignored and the rollback of the other installers continues.

[!code-cpp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CPP/installer_uninstall.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/CS/installer_uninstall.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Installer_Uninstall#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Installer_Uninstall/VB/installer_uninstall.vb#1)]

exception.span: 保存的状态 可能已损坏。

span.span: The saved-state might have been corrupted.

exception.span: 卸载时发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred while uninstalling.

exception.span: 忽略该异常，卸载继续进行。

span.span: This exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.

exception.span: 但是，卸载完成后应用程序可能未完全卸载。

span.span: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstallation completes.

para.span: -如果在派生类中重写方法, 请确保先在派生方法中调用基类的方法。

span.span: - If you override the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method first in your derived method.

para.span: 方法调用此实例的属性中包含的每个安装程序的方法。

span.span: The method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance.

para.span: 在包含的安装程序运行后, 此方法更新对象 ( 通过参数指定) 以反映安装的状态。

span.span: After the contained installers run, this method updates the object (specified through the parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.

para.span: 传递给方法时, 应为空。

span.span: The should be empty when passed to the method.

para.span: 如果所有方法均成功 , 则调用方法。

span.span: If all the methods succeed, the method is called.

para.span: 否则, 将调用方法。

span.span: Otherwise, the method is called.

para.span: -如果需要将安装程序实例添加到 方法中的集合, 请确保在方法中对集合执行相同的添加。

span.span: - If you need to add installer instances to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method.

para.span: 但是, 如果将安装程序实例添加到自定义安装程序的类构造函数中的集合, 则可以避免在这两种方法中维护该集合。

span.span: However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
